name: Master's Prisoner
description:
Master's Prisoner

Master's Prisoner was made in 2 weeks and and is an entry for the 105$ Adventure Game Jam. The goal of this game is to escape a  vampire who uses magic to form puzzles, preventing the player's success. Master's Prisoner consists of 5 puzzles each harder in difficulty than the last. The game is almost completely dialog driven, revealing the secrets of the castle.

Controls:
  • WASD - Movement
  • E - start a dialog/ continue dialog
  • R - reset a puzzle
  • Q  - Switch between players.
Take Note:

Sometimes the pressure plates will glitch out. If so step off them and step back on them (move the crate off and back on).

Sometimes the Dialog Zones Also glitch out. If so, just move around them and continue pressing E.

Credits:

Black Out Studios Team Members Made the Majority of the Game:

MigDev - Programmer, "Game Maker" (https://migdev.itch.io/)

Gaby - Character and Tile Art, Story Design

Isiah - Puzzle Design, Story Design, and Art

Ezra - Music Design

With the Help of:

Sharkn8do - Additional Art Assets (Sharkn8do - itch.io)
